entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as speaking and holding out his hand. He is also referred to as the one who received a new wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as reacting to Hermione getting up and looking apprehensive again. He is also referred to as passing Harry the new wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as getting up from her bed, putting a vanquished Horcrux into a beaded bag, and climbing back into her bed.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: A Horcrux is mentioned as being vanquished and put into a beaded bag by Hermione.

relationships.description: Ron passed Harry the new wand, indicating that Ron gave something to Harry.
Hermione put the vanquished Horcrux into a beaded bag, indicating that she put something into a container.
